Key Match Events: Bobby Portis made his first four 3-point attempts and tallied 20 points in the first nine minutes
Giannis Antetokounmpo threw down a one-handed slam in transition
AJ Johnson used his speed to finish around Anthony Davis
Pre-Game Insights: Doc Rivers was pleased with the effort level throughout the entire game
Rivers emphasized the importance of strong perimeter defense
Post-Match Reflections: Bobby Portis credited his hard work over the summer for his strong start to the preseason
AJ Johnson impressed with his speed and ability to create advantages for his team
Miscellaneous Highlights: Giannis Antetokounmpo gave up his body to make a chase-down block on LeBron James
Bobby Portis made a pump fake in transition to fool Lakers defenders and create a dunk for Antetokounmpo
